description: This Dart source file defines the NotesProvider class, which manages note state and interactions with the notes repository in a Flutter application. It handles loading, searching, adding, updating, deleting, and toggling pinned status of notes, and integrates with the application's settings provider to customize sorting.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A provider class that manages the state of notes, including loading, searching, adding, updating, deleting, and pinning notes, with integration to external settings.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads all notes from the repository, optionally considering the current sort setting from the SettingsProvider.

methods.name: setQuery
methods.description: Sets the search query string and notifies listeners.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search with the given query, updating the notes list accordingly.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: addOrUpdate
methods.description: Adds a new note or updates an existing one, setting timestamps appropriately.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its identifier.

methods.name: togglePin
methods.description: Toggles the pinned status of a note.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Reloads the notes, optionally considering the current context.
